casebody.data:
IN RE LMB, Minor. SC: 157903
COA: 338169 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 27, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Children's Law Section of the State Bar of Michigan to file a brief amicus curiae and to extend the time for doing so is GRANTED IN PART. The amicus brief will be accepted for filing if submitted on or before August 10, 2018.
